Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto abetsimbi baliba mushinyasio shia Jahannam tsinyanga tsioosi
Shibalihulusibwa khushinyasio esho tawe, ne omo baliwesiakhwo omwoyo. (okhurulamwo)
Ne shikhwabakholela amabii tawe halali boo abeene nibo bali abamabii
Ne balikhupa oluyoka nibalanga: “ewe Malik! Boolela Nyasaye wuwo akhufwisie’’ naye alibaboolela mbu: “enywe toto omo butswa nimwamulamenya.”
Toto khwabetsela nende obwatoto halali obunji bwenyu mwali mwakhaya obwatoto
Nohomba babusia amalako kabu, ne toto nefwe babusinjia
Nohomba baparanga mbu efwe shikhuwulilanga akobwifisi nende kokhumonyana kabu tawe? Eeh tawe, abarumwa befu bali ninabo bahandikanga kabakholanga
Boola mbu: “ Nyasaye abetsanga nende Omwana nesie wakhabeele weyimbeli okhumulaama.”
Ni woluyali Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo, Nyasaye Omulesi weshisaala, khu koosi kabamureetsangakhwo
Ne baleshe bokoyaane nibabaya okhula shinga balinyoolana nende inyanga yabalakwa
Naye niye Nyasaye uli mwikulu nende Nyasaye uli mushialo naye niye Omuchesi Omumanyi muno
Ni woluyali ulia owuli nobwami bwomwikulu nende mushialo nende biosi bilimwo, ne niye uli nobumanyi bwebise bieyindukho ne ewuwe ni amulikalusibwa
Ne abamulaamanga abalali ye babula obunyali bwokhubasabila Omundu eshileshelo. Halali ulia wobuloli bwatoto nabo bamanya
Nenobareeba mbu niwina wabaloongabo, ? toto bweene balaboola mbu ni: “ Nyasaye” kho ni hena abakalukhanibungwa
Ne okhuboola khukhwe (Omurumwa) mbu : “Nyasaye wanje Omulesi bano ni Abandu balasuubila tawe.”
Baleshele ne obaboolele amakhuwa komuleembe. Baliitsa okhumanya
